title: Do You Want to Hoard Some Snowglobes?
description: A man wants to dedicate a room of his house to the movie Frozen; his husband objects. With special expert witnesses Robert Lopez and Kristen Anderson-Lopez!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
